thread.title: Baahubali singer L Revanth makes it to the Top 12 contestants of Indian Idol!
thread.title_full: Baahubali singer L Revanth makes it to the Top 12 contestants of Indian Idol!

author: Aishwarya V
title: Baahubali singer L Revanth makes it to the Top 12 contestants of Indian Idol!
text: January 7, 2017 Aishwarya V 1482 reads 0 comments Indian Idol 9 started with a bang when the judges of season one - Anu Malik, Farah Khan and Sonu Nigam teamed up once again. In the first week itself, we saw a big surprise when one of the singers from the Telugu version of the magnum opus Baahubali auditioned for the show. Named LV Revanth Kumar, the talented singer has sung more than 200 songs in Tollywood and wants to make it big in Bollywood too. He auditioned for the show so that the Indian Idol platform will help venture into the world of Bollywood. During the first round itself, Revanth impressed the judges and won the ticket to Mumbai. Now, we have reports that state, the Manohari singer has made it to the Top 12 contestants of the singing reality show. Talking about it, a source from the set stated, "Revanth's energy in the audition round has left everyone stunned. He is aiming at winning viewerâ€™s hearts and wants to win the competition."
